text: We are researching renewable gas in @MaREIcentre, research led by @JerryDMurphy66 who also leads the IEA TCP Bioenergy task on biogas. We do collaborative research with @GasNetIrl who has set a target to achieve 20% of Ireland’s gas from renewable gas by 2030.
@ietsbio3 @RyanInstitute kick off of the 8th international conference on biotechniques for air pollution and bioenergy. pic.twitter.com/TnBqN6F3O4

For land use and food it's a lot blurrier - unsustainable H2O use, N, kcal/kg, competition with bioenergy, construction, sequestration, biodiversity etc.

#Agroecological farming can help to keep #GlobalWarming below 2°C.   French think-tank IDDRI looks at how #climatemitigationstrategies often rely on intensifying #Food production, to increase yields to free up land for afforestation and bioenergy.   https://www.smallholder.co.uk/news/17583795.agroecological-farming-can-help-to-keep-global-warming-below-2c-says-new-report/?ref=twtrec …pic.twitter.com/ZRl7KkskGT
